code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';function CandidateList(){const[candidats,setCandidats]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchCandidats=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/candidats');setCandidats(response.data);}catch(err){setError("Erreur lors de la récupération des candidats.");}};fetchCandidats();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"max-w-5xl mx-auto mt-6"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-center mb-6"},"Liste des Candidats"),error&&/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"text-red-500 text-center"},error),candidats.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"text-center text-gray-500"},"Aucun candidat enregistr\xE9."):/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6"},candidats.map(c=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:`/candidats/${c.id}`,key:c.id,className:"block p-4 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:c.photo||"/default-avatar.png",alt:c.name,className:"w-24 h-24 rounded-full mb-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold"},c.nom," ",c.prenom),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"text-gray-500"},c.parti||"Indépendant"))))));}export default CandidateList;
